post:
I have an LET offer:

- Dual Xeon X5650 (12 cores / 24 threads)

- 32GB DDR3 ECC RAM

- 1TB HDD

- /29 IP Block (5 Usable)

- 10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps

- iDRAC Remote Access

We own our hardware and host it out of Carrier-1 in Dallas, Texas.

This is $49 per month with the code "10down".

This server would be setup within 24 hours.

We can install the OS for you or you can do it yourself through iDRAC!

This server is currently low in stock which is why we are offering it for a lower price.

It can be configured here: https://ssdblaze.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=51

Thanks!
